name: See All Evil
description:
“..countless scholars (including yours truly, humble Ummayah) have embarked on expeditions to find this Valley of Is’ilqon, in search for the Azure Library. It was said that The Library contains Marzuk Er’s collections of every books, tomes and manuscripts ever written. It was a known custom for the scholars of the old days to offer a copy of the book they’ve written to Marzuk Er, The God of Knowledge. But all these mere-mortals written  books could not hold their ground against the The Fountain of Knowledge, Kitab Al Fas’ab (Tome of Faces). Written by Marzuk Er himself, The tome was believed to record the history of every human being ever lived. The Kitab bores the marking “See All Evil” which represents the all seeing eyes of Marzuk Er.."

-excerpt from "The Fountain of Knowledge" written by Ummayah Bin Habal
